survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Smart Kitchen Appliances
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and user experience with smart kitchen appliances, focusing on usability, features, and overall performance.

questions.question_text: Which smart kitchen appliances do you currently own?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Ensure options cover common smart kitchen appliances.

script.question_text: Which smart kitchen appliances do you currently own?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your smart kitchen appliances?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Mobile-friendly radio buttons recommended.
